1.2.2: Article 1.2.2 - Capital Requirements: 'The minimum capital requirement for Category 2 (marketplace lending) is QAR 7,500,000.'
2.1.1: Article 2.1.1 - Data Residency: 'All payment and customer data must be stored within the State of Qatar unless explicit approval is given.'
2.2.1: Article 2.2.1 - Compliance Officer: 'Licensees must appoint a designated and independent Compliance Officer responsible for AML/CFT compliance.'
1.1.4: Article 1.1.4 - Fit & Proper: 'Key officers and persons performing critical functions must provide fit and proper documentation as required by the regulator.'
1.2.4: Article 1.2.4 - Corporate Documents: 'License applicants must submit signed Articles of Association and any amendments demonstrating corporate governance and ownership structure.'
2.1.3: Article 2.1.3 - Data Retention: 'Licensees shall retain payment and customer transaction records for a period of ten (10) years from the date of the transaction, unless otherwise directed by the regulator.'
